name: Hey Pitcher Pitcher! (demo)
description:
Grab your electricity imbued baseball bat and go beat up some baddies in this retro inspired wave based hack and slash!

(This game is an early demo version. Bugs may occur.)  

How to play: Patreon:   

You can support me on patreon and get exclusive access to: 

future game builds,  sprite animations,  music tracks,  concept art and other stuff I will be uploading

a game by @kaliptro
